attributes.action: Set a legal workplace minimum and maximum work place temperature.
attributes.additional_details:
Many people are suffering in workplaces due to no legal workplace temperature.
Many people have disabilities, respiratory, circulation issues which the cold triggers and others receiving treatment. 

Helping keep more in work due to a warmer environment, rather than fit notes signing them off.
attributes.background:
I would like the government to set a legal workplace minimum and maximum workplace temperature.
Not a recommendation which is currently 16^ degrees, or 13^ degrees for physical effort.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
